title: Did California Governor Jerry Brown Veto a Wildfire Management Bill, Increasing the Risk of Wildfires?
subtitle: A conservative political web site drew a link between the Democrat's rejection of a legislative proposal in 2016, and the prevalence and risk of wildfires in the following two years.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Jerry Brown vetoed a wildfire management bill in 2016, contributing to the prevalence and risk of wildfires in the ensuing two years.
